nodes.bodyText:
This should be nested within .run-button { to avoid collisions with other rune-buttons in the app.
In general the content of every scss file is nested within a selector of the same name.

nodes.bodyText: Doing className={runeMode ? 'rune-button' : undefined} here would be more idiomatic.
